entry.content:
Instagram     Email

Handmade boutique guitars & repair

 

Service and repairs

Neck work
Fret Removal for conversion to fretless.........50
Fret Dress....................................................120.00
A fret dress includes leveling all the frets, re-crowning, and polishing of the frets and fretboard. Often this service is needed even on new guitars in order to set them up to play their best.

Complete Re-fret........................................400.00 Includes leveling of the fretboard
Complete Re-fret plus refinishing Maple fretboard.........500
          + change radius...................................20

Partial Re-fret (requires a fret dress).........15.00 per fret plus 120.00 for fret dress.
Loose Fret Ends, per fret..........................5.00
High Fret Leveling, per fret.......................5.00 If more than a couple of frets are high, a complete leveling is needed
Polish Frets...............................................30.00

New Bone Nut, 6 string..............................50
New Bone Nut, 12 string.........................150.00


Adjustments
Jack replacement.......................................40
Install/change pickups...............................50
Nut adjustment...........................................30
Neck Shim installation................................20
Minor finish repair.....................................30/hr
 
Setups
Electric Guitar Setup, hardtail models ………………………………....….50.00
Electric Guitar Setup, Strat style floating tremolo …………….......…..….60.00
Electric Guitar Setup, Floyd Rose style floating tremolo …………..........100.00
Volume and Tone Pot, and Switch Cleaning…………………......………..5.00 per pot
Replacing pots, pickups, etc…………………………………………………30.00/hour

Bass Guitar Setup, basic…………..65.00

Miscellaneous
Cleaning and fretboard oiling.........25
Restring.........20
Repair inlays.........10/inlay

Shop Hourly Rate is $35.00 per hour. Since each guitar is unique, prices quoted are estimates and may be adjusted based on actual time involved. A final price will be submitted prior to actual work and price may need to be adjusted in the case of repairs that get more involved as the work progresses.
 
Connect with us @
instagram: @moonandpearl.lutherie
email: moonandpearllutherie@gmail.com
Located in North Hollywood, CA 
USA
